remarks: The ideal span of a set of elements in a ring is contained in any subring which contains those elements.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.)
statement:
rspcl.k $e |- K = ( RSpan ` R ) $.
rspssp.u $e |- U = ( LIdeal ` R ) $.
rspssp $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. U /\ G C_ I ) -> ( K ` G ) C_ I ) $.
